resources.string: CREATE TABLE if not exists `animeList` ( `id` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `title` CHAR(40) NOT NULL, `type` CHAR(40) NOT NULL, `imageUrl` CHAR(40) NOT NULL, `episodes` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` CHAR(40) NOT NULL, `watchedEpisodes` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `score` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `watchedStatus` CHAR(40) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
